category.title: History
category.point: My current role requires providing prompt, reliable, and accurate information to customers while maintaining composure and effective communication. Adjusting to the pace and technical level of the customer ensures the highest level of quality support.

Assisted the company transition from Blackberry to Apple mobile devices. This included implementing user accounts, resolving hardware and software issues, and installing and configuring applications on iPhones and iPads.
